item.name: Drow Brass Knuckles +1
item.text:
Unarmed: When you make an unarmed attack you can choose to deal the damage of this weapon instead of your normal unarmed attack damage.
You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. This weapon loses its enchantment bonus permanently if it is exposed to sunlight for 1 hour or longer.
Proficiency: simple, knuckles Source: Monster Manual (2014) p. 126, Player's Handbook (2014) p. 149
